law.catch_line: In addition to any duties set forth elsewhere, the Trust shall:...
law.text:
In addition to any duties set forth elsewhere, the Trust shall:
be responsible for the restoration and preservation of the State House; and
disapprove or approve and supervise:
any proposed repair, improvement, or other change to the State House or to any other building within State Circle, including any change to the furnishings or fixtures of those buildings; and
any proposed landscaping of the grounds of those buildings.
